name: Loiby
description:
This little adventure is from the trainee-studio TACO from germany.
The story is about a cute little frog-creature, who is captured by an alien and tries now to get back to earth.

Allow us to give you the hint that we are all simply designers/and artists who tried their best to do the blueprints. But thats not our strength. 

We tried with this game to create an atmosphere from Nintendo64, the old classical style. Enjoy the Game. :)
